fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render.texture

Class GradientTextureTask

  • Object
    • AbstractTask
      • AbstractTextureTask<BinaryGradientTexture>
        • GradientTextureTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextureTask<BinaryGradientTexture>, Task, Runnable

    public class GradientTextureTask
extends AbstractTextureTask<BinaryGradientTexture>
    Author:
    JeT This Task generates a GradientImage and transform it into a gradient image with false colors
